dict.string:
1. Enable the Tweak: Activate the tweak in your settings. 2. Enter a Reasonable iOS Version: Input a plausible iOS version. (Note: Entering an unrealistic version may cause the app to crash after download.) 3. Tap Apply: Confirm your changes by tapping the "Apply" button. 4. Purchase the App: Proceed to purchase the app. (It will successfully purchase, but the installation may fail.) 5. Disable the Tweak: After the purchase, turn off the tweak. 6. Install the Last Compatible Version: If available, download and install the last compatible version of the app.
Disclaimer: Enabling the update option may result in your device displaying an excessive number of updates, depending on the version you spoofed.
